org.modelio.api.module.context.project

Interface IProjectStructure


  • public interface IProjectStructure
    This interface describes the Modelio project itself: ie its name, path, type...

    Also describes the installed fragments and modules.

    Since:
    3.5

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<IFragmentStructure> getFragments()
      Get the list of all model fragments in the project.
      java.util.List<IModuleStructure> getModules()
      Get the list of all modules in the project.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the project's name.
      java.nio.file.Path getPath()
      Get the project directory i.e. the project.conf location.
      java.lang.String getRemoteLocation()
      Get the project remote location.
      java.lang.String getType()
      Get the project type, either LOCAL or HTTP.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get the project's name.
        Returns:
        the project's name.

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Get the project type, either LOCAL or HTTP.
        Returns:
        the project type.

      • getPath

        java.nio.file.Path getPath()
        Get the project directory i.e. the project.conf location.
        Returns:
        the directory containing the project.conf.

      • getRemoteLocation

        java.lang.String getRemoteLocation()
        Get the project remote location.

        Returns null for LOCAL projects.

        Returns:
        the project remote location.
        See Also:
        getType()

      • getFragments

        java.util.List<IFragmentStructure> getFragments()
        Get the list of all model fragments in the project.

        The returned list is not modifiable.

        Returns:
        all model fragments.

      • getModules

        java.util.List<IModuleStructure> getModules()
        Get the list of all modules in the project.

        The returned list is not modifiable.

        Returns:
        all model fragments.
